Key Match Events: Jordan Bos scores with his first touch of the game after coming on as a substitute
Irvine slots the ball inside the net to give a well-deserved lead to Australia
Gurpreet comes out to collect the ball but cannot hold on to it and it falls straight to Irvine
Pre-Game Insights: Igor Stimac’s men have been drawn with Syria, Uzbekistan and the Socceroos in Group B
Australia will kick off its journey in the AFC Asian Cup 2023 in Qatar against India on January 13 at the Ahmad bin Ali Stadium in Qatar
India will participate for the fifth time in Asia’s biggest continental tournament when the AFC Asian Cup 2023 kicks off on January 12 in Qatar
Post-Match Reflections: India suffers a 2-0 loss against Australia in their opening Group B match of the AFC Asian Cup 2023
India needs to try and create openings if it wants to salvage anything from the match
Igor Stimac’s men showed excellent communication in defence to keep Australia at bay
Miscellaneous Highlights: India vs Australia AFC Asian Cup 2023 Group B match from the Ahmed bin Ali Stadium in Qatar
The match will be live telecasted on the Sports18 network and live streamed on the Jio Cinema app and website
Others: The Blue Tigers have qualified for consecutive editions of the AFC Asian Cup for the first time
Igor Stimac, India’s head coach, said about Australia on Friday that it is going to be very difficult for India to win against Australia
